attributes.action: The general public should be able to vote if PM stays in parliament not the MPs
attributes.additional_details: I feel strongly that due to the party gate and sue gray report that it should be up to the public to decide if this government is fit enough to continue not the PMs own party. We as the public have the right to have our voice heard in this matter.
attributes.background: Right to vote if the PM should stay in position after the insult he made by having gatherings. The government has only served its own interests and not that of general public.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
